001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.net.URI;
004import java.nio.file.Paths;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Map;
007import java.util.Objects;
008import java.util.Optional;
009import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
010import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock;
011
012import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogOutput.OutputProvider;
013import io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.FileOutputBuilder;
014import io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.ListLogOutput;
015
016/**
017 * Register output providers by URI scheme.
018 */
019public sealed interface LogOutputRegistry extends OutputProvider permits DefaultOutputRegistry {
020
021        /**
022         * A meta URI scheme to reference outputs registered somewhere else.
023         */
024        public static String NAMED_OUTPUT_SCHEME = "name";
025
026        /**
027         * The URI scheme for list provider.
028         */
029        public static String LIST_OUTPUT_SCHEME = "list";
030
031        /**
032         * Register a provider by {@link URI#getScheme() scheme}.
033         * @param scheme URI scheme to match for.
034         * @param provider provider for scheme.
035         */
036        public void register(String scheme, OutputProvider provider);
037
038        /**
039         * Finds an output by name.
040         * @param name output name.
041         * @return maybe an output.
042         */
043        Optional<LogOutput> output(String name);
044
045        /**
046         * Attempts to reopen all outputs of a certain type usually for log rotation. This
047         * call will block if it attempts to reopen. If reopening is already happening an
048         * empty list will be returned.
049         * @return the output status of reopened outputs or an empty list if no outputs were
050         * reopened.
051         */
052        public List<LogResponse> reopen();
053
054        /**
055         * Attempts to flush all outputs usually for log rotation. This call will block if it
056         * attempts to flush. If flush is already happening an empty list will be returned.
057         * @return the output status of reopened outputs or an empty list if no outputs were
058         * reopened.
059         */
060        public List<LogResponse> flush();
061
062}
063
064final class DefaultOutputRegistry implements LogOutputRegistry {
065
066        private final Map<String, LogOutput> outputs = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
067
068        private final Map<String, OutputProvider> providers = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
069
070        private final ServiceRegistry serviceRegistry;
071
072        private final ReentrantLock reopenLock = new ReentrantLock();
073
074        static LogOutputRegistry of(ServiceRegistry serviceRegistry) {
075                var r = new DefaultOutputRegistry(serviceRegistry);
076                for (var p : StandardLogOutputProvider.values()) {
077                        r.register(p.scheme(), p);
078                }
079                return r;
080        }
081
082        public DefaultOutputRegistry(ServiceRegistry serviceRegistry) {
083                this.serviceRegistry = serviceRegistry;
084        }
085
086        @Override
087        public List<LogResponse> reopen() {
088                /*
089                 * TODO check rainbowgum is actually running.
090                 */
091                if (reopenLock.tryLock()) {
092
093                        try {
094                                return Actor.act(
095                                                serviceRegistry.find(LogAppender.class).stream().map(a -> InternalLogAppender.of(a)).toList(),
096                                                LogAction.StandardAction.REOPEN);
097                        }
098                        finally {
099                                reopenLock.unlock();
100                        }
101                }
102                else {
103                        return List.of();
104                }
105        }
106
107        @Override
108        public List<LogResponse> flush() {
109                /*
110                 * TODO check rainbowgum is actually running.
111                 */
112                if (reopenLock.tryLock()) {
113
114                        try {
115                                return Actor.act(
116                                                serviceRegistry.find(LogAppender.class).stream().map(a -> InternalLogAppender.of(a)).toList(),
117                                                LogAction.StandardAction.FLUSH);
118                        }
119                        finally {
120                                reopenLock.unlock();
121                        }
122                }
123                else {
124                        return List.of();
125                }
126        }
127
128        @Override
129        public void register(String scheme, OutputProvider provider) {
130                providers.put(scheme, provider);
131        }
132
133        private LogOutput _register(String name, LogOutput output) {
134                if (outputs.putIfAbsent(name, output) != null) {
135                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Name is already in use. name = '%s'".formatted(name));
136                }
137                return output;
138        }
139
140        @Override
141        public Optional<LogOutput> output(String name) {
142                return Optional.ofNullable(outputs.get(name));
143        }
144
145        private static URI normalize(URI uri) {
146                String scheme = uri.getScheme();
147                String path = uri.getPath();
148                String query = uri.getRawQuery();
149                if (scheme == null) {
150                        if (path == null) {
151                                throw new IllegalArgumentException("URI is not proper: " + uri);
152                        }
153                        if (path.startsWith("./")) {
154                                uri = Paths.get(path).toUri();
155                        }
156                        else {
157                                uri = URI.create(path + ":///");
158                        }
159                }
160                else if (scheme.equals("file")) {
161                        if (path.startsWith("/./")) {
162                                path = path.substring(1);
163                        }
164                        uri = Paths.get(path).toUri();
165                        if (query != null) {
166                                uri = URI.create(uri.toString() + "?" + query);
167                        }
168                }
169                return uri;
170        }
171
172        private static LogProviderRef normalize(LogProviderRef ref) {
173                var uri = normalize(ref.uri());
174                return new DefaultLogProviderRef(uri, ref.keyOrNull());
175        }
176
177        @Override
178        public LogProvider<LogOutput> provide(LogProviderRef ref) {
179                ref = normalize(ref);
180                var uri = ref.uri();
181                String scheme = Objects.requireNonNull(uri.getScheme());
182                OutputProvider customProvider = providers.get(scheme);
183                if (customProvider == null) {
184                        throw new LogProviderRef.NotFoundException(
185                                        "No output found. Scheme not registered. scheme: '" + scheme + "',  URI: '" + uri + "'");
186                }
187                var _ref = ref;
188                return (name, config) -> {
189                        return _register(name, customProvider.provide(_ref).provide(name, config));
190                };
191        }
192
193        enum StandardLogOutputProvider implements LogOutput.OutputProvider {
194
195                STDOUT {
196                        @Override
197                        public LogOutput provide(LogProviderRef ref, String name, LogProperties properties) {
198                                return new StdOutOutput();
199                        }
200
201                        @Override
202                        public String scheme() {
203                                return LogOutput.STDOUT_SCHEME;
204                        }
205
206                },
207                STDERR {
208                        @Override
209                        public LogOutput provide(LogProviderRef ref, String name, LogProperties properties) {
210                                return new StdErrOutput();
211                        }
212
213                        @Override
214                        public String scheme() {
215                                return LogOutput.STDERR_SCHEME;
216                        }
217
218                },
219                LIST {
220                        @Override
221                        public LogOutput provide(LogProviderRef ref, String name, LogProperties properties) {
222                                return new ListLogOutput();
223                        }
224
225                        @Override
226                        public String scheme() {
227                                return LIST_OUTPUT_SCHEME;
228                        }
229
230                },
231                FILE {
232                        @Override
233                        public LogOutput provide(LogProviderRef ref, String name, LogProperties properties) {
234                                FileOutputBuilder b = new FileOutputBuilder(name);
235                                var uri = ref.uri();
236                                LogProperties combined;
237                                if (uri.getQuery() != null) {
238                                        combined = LogProperties.of(uri, b.propertyPrefix(), properties, ref.keyOrNull());
239                                        String s = uri.toString();
240                                        int index = s.indexOf('?');
241                                        s = s.substring(0, index);
242                                        uri = URI.create(s);
243                                        uri = Paths.get(uri).toUri();
244                                }
245                                else {
246                                        combined = properties;
247                                }
248                                b.uri(uri);
249                                b.fromProperties(combined);
250                                return b.build();
251                        }
252
253                        @Override
254                        public String scheme() {
255                                return LogOutput.FILE_SCHEME;
256                        }
257                };
258
259                @Override
260                public LogProvider<LogOutput> provide(LogProviderRef ref) {
261                        return (s, c) -> {
262                                return provide(ref, s, c.properties());
263                        };
264                }
265
266                public abstract LogOutput provide(LogProviderRef ref, String name, LogProperties properties);
267
268                public abstract String scheme();
269
270        }
271
272}
